title: Bug 15899: Close All Saved does not work consistently
description: The Close All Saved feature is not functioning as expected.
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, some editors remain open, and their changes are not saved. The expected behavior is that all open editors with unsaved changes should be closed.
EB: When 'Close All Saved' is chosen, it should close all open editors with unsaved changes, saving the changes if necessary. No editors with unsaved changes should remain open after using this feature.
SR:
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple editors.
3. Make changes to some of the editors.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
5. Verify that all editors with unsaved changes are closed, and changes are saved.
